=================================================================================

The trajectory of Bilbo Baggins, who faces an epic quest to retake the Kingdom of Erebor, which was the land of the dwarves long ago conquered by the dragon Smaug. Driven by the contract wizard Gandalf the Grey, Bilbo finds himself among a group of 13 dwarves led by the legendary warrior Thorin Shield-of-Carvalho.A journey leads them to treacherous lands filled with Goblins and Orcs, deadly Wargs and Spiders giants, Wizards and shifters. Although the goal points to the east and the arid Lonely Mountain, first they must escape the goblin tunnels, where Bilbo meets the creature that will change his life forever Gollum. Left alone with Gollum, on the shores of an underground lake, the unassuming Bilbo Baggins not only discovers his cunning and courage, but also gains possession of the "precious" ring that is connected to the fate of all Middle-earth in a way Bilbo can not imagine.
